title: Why wont league load?
body:
so each time i open up league right now it tells me i'm not online. i am online and followed the link to the support page but i don't see anything to help me there. i was connected just fine a few moments ago than it shut down on me. i wanted to see if either riot has an answer as to why or if anyone else experienced this problem.

client working fine earlier, client working fine while using it, told your not connected, and now cant even log in. 

the error it keeps showing as list of reason why i might not be able to connect is because of account transfer not working but i am not and never intended to do so.

replies.body: Are you still having any issues loading the patcher?  Or is this when you are trying to login to your account?  I'm also curious if this is on the legacy or updated client, or regardless?  Let me know!
im not having the issue anymore since it started to work again. when it was happening though was when i was trying to log in or when i was already logged in
I am also having this issue. I have Comcast. I can't get it to fix itself. I'm assuming it is a League issue and not ISP if you're not w/ Comcast as well.
really... right when i post this... huh ok it seems to be working now ill post on this if it stops again i guess...
did you do anything that might have fixed it? currently having this issue. Maybe ISP related? Mine just switched owners (bought out iirc).
